column4: Hi! I made the mistake of formatting / as ext4 when I installed Jaunty yesterday, so now I'm stuck because Clonzilla can't read ext4, so I can't backup my system. Does someone know if I can copy everything in / , reformat in ext3 then put everything back in place? If so, how can I make sur permissions and ownerships won't be messed up?
you could use the live cd to transfer data from the ext4 to any other partition and do your reinstall...
ohh.. sorry.. didnt read your question completely.. follow erUSUL
